mapper.insert: insert into attendance values (seq_att_no.nextval, #{empNo}, current_date, null, null)
mapper.update: update attendance set att_end = current_date where emp_no = #{empNo} and to_char(att_start, 'YYMMDD') = to_char(current_date, 'YYMMDD')
mapper.select: select att_no, emp_no, att_start, att_end, emp_name, round((att_end - att_start) * 24, 2) workHour from attendance where emp_no = #{empNo} order by att_start desc
